item.title: [317]Command help[317]-Allstar(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“x1 att ftw x, post:2, topic:395561”]Here is a command to telle ppl to your location

[code=java]
if (command.startsWith(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client

		p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
            }
        }
    }[/code]

Oh yah Yur command wont start a drop party it will just spawn you those items…[/quote]

Yes I know I’m just trying to create a command so that it’s spawned in the inventory and all the players get teled. Oh and btw, I asked to know how to “add” it into the command.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Command help[317]-Allstar(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Here is a command to telle ppl to your location

[code=java]
if (command.startsWith(“xteleall”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { // loop so it effects all players
if (p != null) { // weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client) p; // specific player’s client

		p.toX = absX;
                    p.toY = absY;
                    p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
            }
        }
    }[/code]

Oh yah Yur command wont start a drop party it will just spawn you those items…

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Command help[317]-Allstar(Delta)
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Hello I’m using a command generator for an Allstar(Basically a Delta). I’m creating a drop party command and I was wondering how I teleport everyone to one spot. Here’s my code:

[code=text]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“DP”)&& playerRights >= 3){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“DP”)){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = COORDS;
teleportToY = COORDS;
addItem(995,500000000);
addItem(1042,1);
addItem(1038,1);
addItem(1040,1);
addItem(1044,1);
addItem(1046,1);
sendMessage(“You have started a drop party!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has started a drop party!";
}[/code]

Thanks for any help.

Read full topic
